name: Our Only Hope
Lore: '''The Emperor knew, as I did, if Anakin were to have any offspring, they would be a threat to him.''',
Text: 'USED: If your Rebel of ability > 2 just won a battle or duel, randomly take into hand one card stacked on Insignificant Rebellion. (Immune to Sense.)LOST: If Luke is in battle (except with Vader), subtract 2 from each of opponent''s battle destiny draws.',
